title: Sensual Submission: Pursuit
description: Botany is captivated by Garrett. He has charm, status, money, but most of all, he takes her to places she's never been with college boys. Garrett means to have Botany. Whatever it takes. Just like making any of his high powered business deals, he'll figure out what it takes to get her. It'll be easy. She'll be easily impressed. She'll be his masterpiece, and he'll have her naked on a pedestal in his museum.This is not the typical BDSM story; rather, it is an explicit romance of lust and passion found at the feet of the master.Publisher's This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable. It is intended for an adult audience. (approximately 260 pages, 57,000 words)
author: Andre SanThomas
